events.message: I received my order last week, but the item does not fit and I would like to get a refund. What is the procedure for returning the product and getting my money back?
The customer's request has been identified as a refund inquiry related to product return and reimbursement.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m Maria and I’ll help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the product has been opened or used? This will help us process your refund smoothly.
The order number is 789456123. I have not opened or used the product; it is still in its original packaging.

Thank you for the information. You can return the product using the prepaid shipping label we will send you shortly. Once we receive the product, we will issue a full refund to your original payment method.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick help. I will ship back the product as soon as I get the label.
The prepaid shipping label has been emailed to you. Please let us know once the product has been sent back so we can track your refund.
Just checking in to confirm whether you have returned the product and if everything is proceeding smoothly with the refund process.
Yes, I returned the item yesterday. The shipping was fast. I’m hoping to see the refund processed soon.
Your refund has been processed and should appear on your statement within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
We are closing your case now. If you have any other questions in the future, feel free to contact us again.
